phases.title: Genesis
phases.summary: Fixing the final high-priority security issues before relaunching Genesis (formerly Devnet) to unblock Horizon.

phases.title: Horizon
phases.summary: Launching after Genesis stabilizes. Early Horizon iterations may be unstable until audits complete.

phases.title: Zenith
phases.summary: Zenith (Mainnet) follows Horizon stability and the final security competition.

notes: Major architectural changes complete (one in progress).
Every patch ships with added tests (caught 3 bugs missed in audit).
